description: Curbs will be relaxed from 4 May as the country records its lowest daily virus death toll in weeks.
title: Coronavirus: Italy's PM outlines lockdown easing measures
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy's PM outlines lockdown easing measures - BBC News
maintext: "If we do not respect the precautions the curve will go up, the deaths will increase, and we will have irreversible damage to our economy," the prime minister said. "If you love Italy, keep your distance."
